results.name: Even cubes: a(n) = (2*n)^3.
comment: a(n) is also the number of non-degenerate triangles that can be drawn with vertices on a cross with n points on each branch. - _James P. B. Hall_, Nov 22 2019
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
